cars.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cox Automotive, Inc. provides digital marketing, software, financial, wholesale, and e-commerce solutions for consumers, dealers, manufacturers, and the automotive ecosystem worldwide.\\nIn addition, the company operates new and used car transaction marketplaces; an automotive marketing platform; an online business-to-business car auction portal; a car search portal; and a\\nmarketplace for multi-brand certified pre-owned cars. Cox Automotive, Inc. was formerly known as AutoTrader Group, Inc. It has locations worldwide. Cox Automotive, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Cox Enterprises, (CAI) is a leading provider of products and services that span the automotive ecosystem worldwide. They’ve built the strongest portfolio in the industry with more than 22 brands that together provide end-to-end digital marketing, wholesale and commerce solutions for customers large and small. Their goal is to simplify the trusted exchange of vehicles and maximize value for dealers, manufacturers and car shoppers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CAI businesses operate in five core areas with a domestic and global presence. Those areas are: Auto Auctions & Wholesale Services, Financial Services, Media, Software, and International. Their brands lead the industry with best-in-class offerings, which we support and market individually. Powerful on their own, they’re even more potent when they work synergistically as Cox Automotive.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The CAI brands provides a comprehensive set of products and services that simplify workflows, remove friction, and enable the smart, connected experience dealers, lenders, OEMs, mobility providers and consumers expect.
